title: Slap Battles Mobile Scripts and Hacks - Kill-Aura, No Cooldown
text:
From this page you can download a pack of scripts and hacks for the mobile version of the game Slap Battles in the world of Roblox. A large selection of scripts with powerful functions that you can use directly during the game using a convenient GUI. For example, you will be able to activate such functions as: Kill-Aura, Glove Esp, No Cooldown, Auto Enter To Arena, Walk Speed, Jump Power, Trolling mode and many more.
Slap Battles remains one of the most popular games in the world of Roblox and therefore many players use hacks and scripts to compete with other players using the hidden features of the game. You will not get a ban for using these scripts in the mobile version of Roblox game.

✅DeltaX
✅Fluxus
✅CodeX
✅Arceus X
How to use Roblox Scripts?
creator: Slap-Battles-Open-source
